description: Kirk Cummings"Kick-Ass"Ht: 5'10" WT: 145lbs Season W/L record ( 0-0)Duncan Black"The Devastator"Ht: 6'2" WT: 165lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Newcomers Kirk "Kick-Ass" Cummings and Duncan "The Devastator" Black step into the ring fighting balls to the wall for sexual domination. The Devastator says he's used to rolling around with his buddy's and today all he's looking forward to is showing his opponent who the bitch is by ramming his cock up the loser's ass. Kick-Ass doesn't see things the same as The Devastator, he's been killing it at the gym and he plans on kicking his pretty boy of an opponent's ass and treating him like the piece of meat he is. Relentless leg locks and hard slams make this match one to never forget. Who will show they have what it takes to fight here on Naked Kombat, and who will have no other choice but to submit to the winner's rough victory fuck?
title: Kirk "Kick-Ass" Cummings vs Duncan "The Devastator" Black
